activities: Newton Consulting, LLC and its subsidiaries in Europe and Canada provide leadership development, talent acquisition services, business strategy, systems integration, project management, and business management consulting services to customers throughout the U.S., Europe, and Canada. Newton Consulting centralizes its human resources function in the United States for all subsidiaries under the control of Newton Consulting and as such, the HR department collects and processes personal information for employees for functions such as: payroll and performance management.  Voluntary email contact list subscription services are available through the websites as well, but are not a requirement of utilizing the websites.
personaldata: employee, organizational, and client - On-line, off-line and manually processed data
recoursemech: We encourage individuals to raise any concerns using the contact information provided within the Privacy Policy and we will investigate and attempt to resolve any complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of personal information in accordance with the principles.  If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, we agree to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the EU data protection authorities ("DPA's") to resolve disputes pursuant to the Principles.  The EU DPA's may be contacted directly via the information provided at: http://ec.europa.eu/justice/data-protection/bodies/authorities/eu/index_en.htm.
